card.name: A Clash of Kings
card.property: Reaction: After you win a [Power] challenge, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own.

card.name: A Feast for Crows
card.property: Reaction: After you win dominance, gain 2 power for your faction.

card.name: A Game of Thrones
card.property: A player cannot initiate a [Military] or [Power] challenge unless he or she has won an [Intrigue] challenge that phase.

card.name: A Noble Cause
card.property: Reduce the cost of the first Lord or Lady character you marshal this round by 2.

card.name: A Storm of Swords
card.property: You may initiate an additional [Military] challenge during the challenges phase.

card.name: Building Orders
card.property: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment or a location, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Calling the Banners
card.property: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Gain 1 gold for each character that player controls.

card.name: Calm Over Westeros
card.property: When Revealed: Name a challenge type. Until you reveal a new plot card, reduce the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card by 1 during challenges of that type in which you are the defending player.

card.name: Confiscation
card.property: When Revealed: Choose an attachment, and discard it from play.

card.name: Counting Coppers
card.property: When Revealed: Draw 3 cards.

card.name: Filthy Accusations
card.property: When Revealed: Choose and kneel a character.

card.name: Fortified Position
card.property: Treat each character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

card.name: Heads on Spikes
card.property: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Discard 1 card at random from that player's hand. If that card is a character, gain 2 power for your faction and place the discarded character in its owner's dead pile.

card.name: Jousting Contest
card.property: Each player cannot declare more than 1 character as an attacker or defender in each challenge.

card.name: Marched to the Wall
card.property: When Revealed: Each player chooses a character he or she controls (if able), and discards it from play (cannot be saved).

card.name: Marching Orders
card.property: You cannot marshal locations or attachments, or play events.

card.name: Naval Superiority
card.property: Treat the base gold value on each revealed Kingdom and each revealed Edict plot card as if it were 0.

card.name: Power Behind the Throne
card.property: When Revealed: Place 1 stand token on Power Behind the Throne. Action: Discard 1 stand token from Power Behind the Throne to choose and stand a character.

card.name: Rebuilding
card.property: When Revealed: Choose up to 3 cards in your discard pile, and shuffle them into your deck.

card.name: Reinforcements
card.property: When Revealed: Choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower in your hand or discard pile, and put it into play.

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.property: You cannot initiate more than 1 challenge during the challenges phase.

card.name: Summons
card.property: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Supporting the Faith
card.property: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, each player returns all gold in his or her gold pool to the treasury.

card.name: Taxation
card.property: You may marshal or play 1 additional limited card this round.

card.name: Wildfire Assault
card.property: When Revealed: Each player chooses up to 3 characters he or she controls. Kill each character not chosen (cannot be saved).

card.name: Fealty
card.property: You cannot include more than 15 neutral cards in your deck. Action: Kneel your faction card to reduce the cost of the next loyal card you marshal or play this phase by 1.

card.name: Littlefinger
card.property: Reaction: After you marshal Littlefinger, draw 2 cards. +1 Income.

card.name: Varys
card.property: Stealth. Interrupt: When the dominance phase ends, remove Varys from the game to discard each character from play.

card.name: Rattleshirt's Raiders
card.property: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Rattleshirt's Raiders is participating as an attacker, choose an attachment controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play.

card.name: Wildling Horde
card.property: No attachments. Pillage. Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a participating Wildling character you control. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.

card.name: Seal of the Hand
card.property: Lord or Lady character only. Action: Kneel Seal of the Hand to stand attached character.

card.name: Bodyguard
card.property: Lord or Lady character only. Interrupt: When attached character would be killed or discarded from play, sacrifice Bodyguard to save that character.

card.name: Little Bird
card.property: Attached character gains an [Intrigue] icon.

card.name: Milk of the Poppy
card.property: Terminal. Treat attached character's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).

card.name: Noble Lineage
card.property: Attached character gains a [Power] icon.

card.name: Syrio's Training
card.property: Attached character gains a [Military] icon.

card.name: The Iron Throne
card.property: The Iron Throne contributes 8 STR to your total for dominance. +1 Reserve.

card.name: The Kingsroad
card.property: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel and sacrifice The Kingsroad to reduce the cost of the next character you marshal this phase by 3. +1 Initiative.

card.name: The Roseroad
card.property: Limited. +1 Income.

card.name: Put to the Sword
card.property: Reaction: After you win a [Military] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent. (Max 1 per challenge.)

card.name: Put to the Torch
card.property: Reaction: After you win a [Military] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, choose a location controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play. (Max 1 per challenge.)

card.name: Superior Claim
card.property: Reaction: After you win a [Power] challenge by 5 or more STR, gain 2 power for your faction. (Max 1 per challenge.)

card.name: Tears of Lys
card.property: Reaction: After you win an [Intrigue] challenge as the attacking player, place a poison token on a character without an [Intrigue] icon controlled by the losing opponent. At the end of the phase, if that character still has the poison token, remove it and kill that character. (Max 1 per challenge.)

card.name: The Hand's Judgment
card.property: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, cancel those effects. X is that event's printed cost.

card.name: Maester Cressen
card.property: Marshaling Action: Kneel Maester Cressen to choose a Condition attachment, and discard it from play.

card.name: Melisandre
card.property: Reaction: After you marshal or play a R'hllor card, choose and kneel a character. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Robert Baratheon
card.property: Intimidate. Renown. Robert Baratheon gets +1 STR for each other kneeling character in play.

card.name: Selyse Baratheon
card.property: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold to choose a [House Baratheon] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [Intrigue] icon.

card.name: Ser Davos Seaworth
card.property: Stealth. Interrupt: When Ser Davos Seaworth is killed, return him to your hand instead of placing him in your dead pile.

card.name: Shireen Baratheon
card.property: Interrupt: When Shireen Baratheon is killed, choose and kneel a character.

card.name: Stannis Baratheon
card.property: Each player cannot stand more than 2 characters during the standing phase.

card.name: Fiery Followers
card.property: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, stand Fiery Followers.

card.name: King's Hunting Party
card.property: No attachments. While an opponent controls a King character, King's Hunting Party gains an [Intrigue] icon .

card.name: Dragonstone Faithful
card.property: Marshaling Action: Kneel Dragonstone Faithful to reduce the cost of the next [House Baratheon] character you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Vanguard Lancer
card.property: Reaction: After Vanguard Lancer enters play, choose an opponent's character or faction card, and discard 1 power from that card.

card.name: Lightbringer
card.property: [House Baratheon] character only. If attached character is Stannis Baratheon, he gains renown. Reaction: After attached character gains 1 or more power, stand it. (Limit once per phase.)

card.name: Dragonstone Port
card.property: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Dragonstone Port to reduce the cost of the next [House Baratheon] card you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Chamber of the Painted Table
card.property: Reaction: After you win dominance, kneel Chamber of the Painted Table to move 1 power from an opponent's faction card to your own.

card.name: The Red Keep
card.property: The Red Keep contributes 2 STR to your side during any [Power] challenge in which you control a participating character. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost a [Power] challenge this round, kneel The Red Keep to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Consolidation of Power
card.property: Marshaling Action: Choose and kneel up to 4 total STR worth of characters controlled by the same player. Then, choose one of those characters, and have it gain 1 power.

card.name: Ours is the Fury
card.property: Play only during a challenge in which you are the defending player. Action: Choose a kneeling [House Baratheon] character you control. That character is now participating as a defender. If you win this challenge, stand that character.

card.name: Seen In Flames
card.property: Play only if you control a R'hllor character. Challenges Action: Choose an opponent, and look at his or her hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand.

card.name: Aeron Damphair
card.property: Reaction: After you win dominance, put an Ironborn character into play from your dead pile.

card.name: Alannys Greyjoy
card.property: While you are the first player, reduce the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.

card.name: Asha Greyjoy
card.property: Stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Asha Greyjoy is participating, stand her.

card.name: Balon Greyjoy
card.property: Renown. While Balon Greyjoy is attacking, each defending character with a lower STR than his does not contribute its STR to that challenge.

card.name: Euron Crow's Eye
card.property: Pillage. Renown. Reaction: After Euron Crow's Eye discards a card using pillage, put a location from the losing opponent's discard pile into play under your control.

card.name: Maester Wendamyr
card.property: Stealth.

card.name: Theon Greyjoy
card.property: Stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Theon Greyjoy is participating, he gains 1 power.

card.name: Black Wind's Crew
card.property: Pillage.

card.name: Drowned Men
card.property: No attachments. Drowned Men gets +1 STR for each Warship location you control.

card.name: Iron Islands Fishmonger
card.property: Marshaling Action: Kneel Iron Islands Fishmonger to reduce the cost of the next [House Greyjoy] character you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Lordsport Shipwright
card.property: Marshaling Action: Kneel Lordsport Shipwright to choose and kneel a location with printed cost 2 or lower. (Printed cost 3 or lower instead if you are the first player.)

card.name: Salty Navigator
card.property: +1 Initiative.

card.name: Throwing Axe
card.property: Ironborn character only. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating as an attacker, sacrifice Throwing Axe to choose and kill a defending character.

card.name: Great Kraken
card.property: While you control Balon Greyjoy, he gains stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, either: draw 1 card, or gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit twice per round.)

card.name: Iron Fleet Scout
card.property: Challenges Action: Kneel Iron Fleet Scout to choose a participating [House Greyjoy] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR. (+2 STR instead if you are the first player.)

card.name: Sea Tower
card.property: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Sea Tower to reduce the cost of the next [House Greyjoy] card you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Risen from the Sea
card.property: Interrupt: When a [House Greyjoy] character would be killed, save it. Then, attach Risen from the Sea to that character as a Condition attachment with the text: "Terminal. Attached character gets +1 STR."

card.name: The Kraken's Grasp
card.property: Play only if you are the first player. Challenges Action: Choose a defending character with STR 5 or lower. That character does not contribute is STR to this challenge.

card.name: We Do Not Sow
card.property: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, choose an attachment or location controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play. (Max 1 per challenge.)

card.name: Cersei Lannister
card.property: While Cersei Lannister is attacking during an [Intrigue] challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

card.name: Grand Maester Pycelle
card.property: Insight.

card.name: Joffrey Baratheon
card.property: Reaction: After a Lord or Lady character is killed, Joffrey Baratheon gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)

card.name: Ser Jaime Lannister
card.property: Ser Jaime Lannister does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [Military] challenge, and gains renown while participating in a [Military] challenge.

card.name: The Tickler
card.property: Dominance Action: Kneel The Tickler to discard the top card of an opponent's deck. Then, you may choose 1 copy of that card, and discard it from play.

card.name: Tyrion Lannister
card.property: Stealth. Reaction: After an [Intrigue] challenge is initiated, gain 2 gold. (Limit twice per round.)

card.name: Tywin Lannister
card.property: Renown. Tywin Lannister gets +1 STR for each gold in your gold pool. +2 Income.

card.name: Burned Men
card.property: Ambush (2).

card.name: Gold Cloaks
card.property: Ambush (2). Forced Interrupt: When a phase ends in which Gold Cloaks entered play using ambush, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

card.name: Lannisport Moneylender
card.property: Limited. +1 Income.

card.name: Lannisport Merchant
card.property: Marshaling Action: Kneel Lannisport Merchant to reduce the cost of the next [House Lannister] character you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: The Queen's Assassin
card.property: Ambush (4). Reaction: After The Queen's Assassin enters play using ambush, choose an opponent. If you have more cards in hand than that player, he or she must choose and kill a character he or she controls.

card.name: Widow's Wail
card.property: Ambush (1). Attached character gets +2 STR. If attached character is Joffrey Baratheon, he gains a [Military] icon.

card.name: Casterly Rock
card.property: You may initiate an additional [Intrigue] challenge during the challenges phase.

card.name: Lannisport
card.property: Reaction: After you win an [Intrigue] challenge, draw 1 card.

card.name: Western Fiefdom
card.property: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Western Fiefdom to reduce the cost of the next [House Lannister] card you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Hear Me Roar!
card.property: Action: Put a [House Lannister] character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

card.name: The Things I Do For Love
card.property: Play only if you control a [House Lannister]Lord or Lady character. Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a character with printed cost X or lower controlled by an opponent, and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Treachery
card.property: Play only if you control a unique [House Lannister] character. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character, location, or attachment ability would initiate, cancel those effects.

card.name: Areo Hotah
card.property: Ambush (5). Reaction: After Areo Hotah enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character, and remove it from the challenge.

card.name: Arianne Martell
card.property: Action: Put a character with printed cost 5 or lower into play from your hand. Then, return Arianne Martell to your hand (cannot be saved). (Limit once per phase.)

card.name: Doran Martell
card.property: Insight. Each other [House Martell]Lord and Lady character you control gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.

card.name: Edric Dayne
card.property: Stealth. Action: Pay 1 gold to give Edric Dayne a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

card.name: Maester Caleotte
card.property: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Maester Caleotte is participating, choose a character. That character loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

card.name: Obara Sand
card.property: Obara Sand may be declared as a defender during [Power] challenges in which you are the defending player, even while kneeling.

card.name: The Red Viper
card.property: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Red Viper is participating as an attacker, he gains 1 power for every 5 STR by which you won the challenge.

card.name: Desert Scavenger
card.property: Marshaling Action: Kneel Desert Scavenger to reduce the cost of the next [House Martell] character you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Dornish Paramour
card.property: Reaction: After Dornish Paramour is declared as an attacker, choose a character controlled by the defending player. That character must be declared as a defender for this challenge, if able.

card.name: Greenblood Trader
card.property: Reaction: After Greenblood Trader enters play, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add up to 1 of those cards to your hand, and place the others on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Palace Spearman
card.property: No attachments. While you are not the first player, Palace Spearman gains an [Intrigue] icon.

card.name: Dawn
card.property: Attached character gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile. While attached character has the House Dayne trait, it gains intimidate.

card.name: Ghaston Grey
card.property: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel and sacrifice Ghaston Grey to return an attacking character to its owner's hand (cannot be saved).

card.name: Sunspear
card.property: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel Sunspear to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during challenges of this same type until the end of the phase.

card.name: Blood Orange Grove
card.property: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Blood Orange Grove to reduce the cost of the next [House Martell] card you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Doran's Game
card.property: Reaction: After you win an [Intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, gain X power for your faction. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile. (Max 1 per challenge.)

card.name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
card.property: Play only if you are not the first player. Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, name a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, the winner of the challenge cannot initiate challenges of that type. (Max 1 per challenge.)

card.name: Confinement
card.property: Action: Choose a character with STR 4 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a [Military], an [Intrigue], and a [Power] icon.

card.name: Benjen Stark
card.property: Each Ranger character you control cannot be bypassed by stealth. Interrupt: When Benjen Stark is killed, gain 2 power for your faction. Then, shuffle him back into your deck instead of placing him in your dead pile.

card.name: Ghost
card.property: No attachments. Stealth. Reaction: After Ghost bypasses a character using stealth, that character cannot be declared as a defender for any challenges until the end of the phase.

card.name: Jon Snow
card.property: No attachments except Weapon. While Jon Snow is standing, he is considered to be participating in each challenge in which you control another attacking [The Night's Watch] character.

card.name: Maester Aemon
card.property: No attachments. Interrupt: When a [The Night's Watch] character would be killed, kneel Master Aemon to save it.

card.name: Old Bear Mormont
card.property: While you control The Wall, Old Bear Mormont does not kneel when declared as a defender. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost a challenge as the defending player this phase, put a [The Night's Watch] card into play from your hand.

card.name: Samwell Tarly
card.property: Insight. +1 Reserve.

card.name: Ser Waymar Royce
card.property: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When Ser Waymar Royce is killed, discard 1 card at random from each opponent's hand.

card.name: Yoren
card.property: Reaction: After you marshal Yoren, choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower in an opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control.

card.name: Messenger Raven
card.property: No attachments. Dominance Action: Return Messenger Raven to your hand to draw 1 card.

card.name: Old Forest Hunter
card.property: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)

card.name: Ranging Party
card.property: No attachments except Weapon.

card.name: Steward at the Wall
card.property: Marshaling Action: Kneel Steward at the Wall to reduce the cost of the next [The Night's Watch] character you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Veteran Builder
card.property: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Sacrifice Veteran Builder to choose and stand a location.

card.name: Longclaw
card.property: [The Night's Watch] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR and gains renown.

card.name: Castle Black
card.property: Action: Kneel Castle Black to choose and stand a defending [The Night's Watch] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.

card.name: The Wall
card.property: Each [The Night's Watch] character you control gets +1 STR. Forced Reaction: After you lose an unopposed challenge, kneel The Wall. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, kneel The Wall to gain 2 power for your faction.

card.name: A Meager Contribution
card.property: Reaction: After an opponent collects income, move 1 gold from that player's gold pool to your own. (Max 1 per round.)

card.name: Take the Black
card.property: Dominance Action: Choose a non-unique character with printed cost 6 or lower. Take control of that character. (Max 1 per round.)

card.name: The Sword in the Darkness
card.property: Play only during a challenge in which you control a participating [The Night's Watch] character. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the defending player, the losing opponent cannot initiate challenges against you this round.

card.name: Arya Stark
card.property: Stealth. While Arya Stark has a duplicate, she gains a [Military] icon. Reaction: After Arya Stark enters play, place the top card of your deck on her facedown as a duplicate.

card.name: Bran Stark
card.property: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, sacrifice Bran Stark to cancel those effects.

card.name: Catelyn Stark
card.property: While Catelyn Stark is participating in a challenge, your opponents cannot trigger card abilities.

card.name: Eddard Stark
card.property: Renown. Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, stand Eddard Stark.

card.name: Grey Wind
card.property: Intimidate. No attachments. Challenges Action: Kneel Grey Wind to choose and kill a character with STR 1 or lower. (STR 2 or lower instead if you control Robb Stark).

card.name: Robb Stark
card.property: Renown. Reaction: After a [House Stark] character you control is sacrificed or killed, stand each character you control. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Sansa Stark
card.property: Sansa Stark enters play knelt. Reaction: After Sansa Stark stands, gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Summer
card.property: No attachments. While you control Bran Stark, he gains insight. Reaction: After Summer enters play, return a [House Stark] character with printed STR 2 or lower from your discard or dead pile to your hand.

card.name: Direwolf Pup
card.property: No attachments. Direwolf Pup gets +1 STR for each other Direwolf card you control.

card.name: Vanguard of the North
card.property: No attachments. While a player has a War plot revealed, Vanguard of the North does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [Military] challenge.

card.name: Winterfell Steward
card.property: Marshaling Action: Kneel Winterfell Steward to reduce the cost of the next [House Stark] character you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Ice
card.property: [House Stark] character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win a [Military] challenge in which attached character is participating, sacrifice Ice to choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent.

card.name: Gates of Winterfell
card.property: Challenges Action: Kneel Gates of Winterfell to reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [House Stark] card, draw it.

card.name: The Wolfswood
card.property: Each Direwolf card in your hand gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost.

card.name: Heart Tree Grove
card.property: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Heart Tree Grove to reduce the cost of the next [House Stark] card you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: For the North!
card.property: Play only during a [Military] challenge. Action: Choose a participating [House Stark] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, draw 1 card.

card.name: Like Warm Rain
card.property: Reaction: After you lose an [Intrigue] challenge as the defending player, kneel a Direwolf character to choose and kill an attacking character. (Max 1 per challenge.)

card.name: Winter Is Coming
card.property: Play only during a challenge. Action: Until the end of the challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1. (Max 1 per challenge.)

card.name: Daenerys Targaryen
card.property: Insight. While Daenerys Targaryen is standing, each character participating on an opponent's side in a challenge against you gets -1 STR.

card.name: Drogon
card.property: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains renown.

card.name: Khal Drogo
card.property: Renown. You may initiate an additional [Military] challenge during the challenges phase.

card.name: Magister Illyrio
card.property: Action: Pay 2 gold to choose and stand a character. (Limit once per phase.)

card.name: Rhaegal
card.property: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which a Stormborn character you control is participating, choose and stand a Stormborn character. (Limit once per phase.)

card.name: Ser Jorah Mormont
card.property: Renown. If Ser Jorah Mormont has 3 or more betrayal tokens on him, sacrifice him. Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Jorah Mormont is participating, place 1 betrayal token on him.

card.name: Viserion
card.property: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains stealth.

card.name: Viserys Targaryen
card.property: Interrupt: When Viserys Targaryen leaves play, choose an attachment, and discard it from play.

card.name: Braided Warrior
card.property: No attachments except Weapon.

card.name: Handmaiden
card.property: Action: Sacrifice Handmaiden to choose and stand a Lady character.

card.name: Targaryen Loyalist
card.property: Marshaling Action: Kneel Targaryen Loyalist to reduce the cost of the next [House Targaryen] character you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Unsullied
card.property: No attachments except Weapon. While Unsullied is attacking, each defending character gets -1 STR.

card.name: Drogo's Arakh
card.property: Dothraki character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. If attached character is Khal Drogo, he does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first [Military] challenge you initiate each round.

card.name: Plaza of Punishment
card.property: Reaction: After you win a [Power] challenge, kneel Plaza of Punishment to choose a character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

card.name: Dothraki Sea
card.property: Reaction: After you win a [Power] challenge, sacrifice Dothraki Sea to put a Dothraki character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand (cannot be saved).

card.name: Illyrio's Estate
card.property: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Illyrio's Estate to reduce the cost of the next [House Targaryen] card you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Dracarys!
card.property: Action: Kneel a Dragon character or Daenerys Targaryen to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

card.name: Fire and Blood
card.property: Challenges Action: Choose a unique [House Targaryen] character in your dead pile, and shuffle it back into your deck. If that character is a Hatchling, you may put it into play instead.

card.name: Waking the Dragon
card.property: Action: Choose and stand a unique [House Targaryen] character you control. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, return it to your hand.

card.name: Left
card.property: No attachments except Weapon. While you control Right, Left gets +1 STR, gains a [Power] icon, and does not kneel when declared as a defender.

card.name: Maester Lomys
card.property: Reaction: After you win an [Intrigue] challenge as the defending player, discard 1 card at random from the attacking player's hand.

card.name: Margaery Tyrell
card.property: Challenges Action: Kneel Margaery Tyrell to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR.

card.name: Paxter Redwyne
card.property: Reduce the cost of the first event you play each round by 1. +1 Income.

card.name: Randyll Tarly
card.property: Renown. Reaction: After Randyll Tarly's STR is increased by a card effect, stand him. (Limit twice per phase.)

card.name: Right
card.property: No attachments except Weapon. While you control Left, Right gets +1 STR, gains an [Intrigue] icon, and does not kneel when declared as a defender.

card.name: The Knight of Flowers
card.property: Renown. While The Knight of Flowers is attacking alone, the defending player cannot declare more than 1 character as a defender.

card.name: The Queen of Thorns
card.property: Reaction: After you win an [Intrigue] challenge in which The Queen of Thorns is participating, put a [House Tyrell] character with printed cost 6 or lower into play from your hand.

card.name: Garden Caretaker
card.property: Marshaling Action: Kneel Garden Caretaker to reduce the cost of the next [House Tyrell] character you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Olenna's Informant
card.property: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Olenna's Informant enters play during the challenges phase, name a challenge type. You may initiate an additional challenge of that type this phase.

card.name: Wardens of the Reach
card.property: No attachments. Wardens of the Reach gets +1 STR for each The Reach location you control.

card.name: Heartsbane
card.property: [House Tyrell] character only. Action: While attached character is participating in a challenge, kneel Heartsbane to give that character +3 STR until the end of the challenge.

card.name: Highgarden
card.property: Challenges Action: Kneel Highgarden and pay 1 gold to choose an attacking character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

card.name: The Mander
card.property: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel The Mander to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Rose Garden
card.property: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Rose Garden to reduce the cost of the next [House Tyrell] card you marshal this phase by 1.

card.name: Growing Strong
card.property: Challenges Action: Choose up to three [House Tyrell] characters. Until the end of the phase, each of the chosen characters gets +2 STR.

card.name: Olenna's Cunning
card.property: Reaction: After you win an [Intrigue] or [Power] challenge, the losing opponent names a cardtype (character, location, attachment, or event). Search your deck for a card with a different cardtype, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: "The Bear and the Maiden Fair"
card.property: Action: Choose a player. Look at the top 5 cards of that player's deck. Place up to 3 of those cards on the bottom of that deck, and the others on top, in any order.

card.name: Banner of the Stag
card.property: You may include non-loyal [House Baratheon] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [House Baratheon] cards in your deck.

card.name: Banner of the Kraken
card.property: You may include non-loyal [House Greyjoy] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [House Greyjoy] cards in your deck.

card.name: Banner of the Lion
card.property: You may include non-loyal [House Lannister] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [House Lannister] cards in your deck.

card.name: Banner of the Sun
card.property: You may include non-loyal [House Martell] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [House Martell] cards in your deck.

card.name: Banner of the Watch
card.property: You may include non-loyal [The Night's Watch] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [The Night's Watch] cards in your deck.

card.name: Banner of the Wolf
card.property: You may include non-loyal [House Stark] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [House Stark] cards in your deck.

card.name: Banner of the Dragon
card.property: You may include non-loyal [House Targaryen] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [House Targaryen] cards in your deck.

card.name: Banner of the Rose
card.property: You may include non-loyal [House Tyrell] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [House Tyrell] cards in your deck.

card.name: Master of Whispers
card.property: Supported by Master of Ships Supports: Hand of the King Rivals: Master of Laws, Master of Coin You may resolve your [Intrigue] claim against any number of opponents of your choice. +1 STR [Intrigue]

card.name: Master of Ships
card.property: Supported by Master of Coin Supports: Master of Whispers Rivals: Master of Laws, Hand of the King Raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during [Military] challenges in which you are attacking a rival. +1 STR [Military]

card.name: Hand of the King
card.property: Supported by Master of Whispers. Supports: Master of Laws. Rivals: Master of Coin, Master of Ships. You may initiate an additional [Power] challenge during the challenges phase, against a different opponent. +1 STR [Power]

card.name: Master of Coin
card.property: Supported by Master of Laws. Supports: Master of Ships Rivals: Hand of the King, Master of Whispers +2 Income.

card.name: Master of Laws
card.property: Supported by Hand of the King Supports: Master of Coin Rivals: Master of Whispers, Master of Ships Increase the number of cards you draw in the draw phase by 1. +1 Reserve.

card.name: Crown Regent
card.property: Supported by None Supports: None Rivals: None You may redirect 1 challenge this round. +2 STR for Dominance
